# DO NOT EDIT THIS FILE! THIS FILE IS AUTOMATICALLY GENERATED BY xml2cmake
PROJECT(M3D)

SET(COMMON_SOURCES
M3DPluginInfo.C
M3DCommonPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBI_SOURCES 
M3DPluginInfo.C
)

SET(LIBM_SOURCES
M3DMDServerPluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtM3DFileFormat.C
)

SET(LIBE_SOURCES
M3DEnginePluginInfo.C
${COMMON_SOURCES}
avtM3DFileFormat.C
)

INCLUDE_DIRECTORIES(
${CMAKE_CURRENT_SOURCE_DIR}
${VISIT_COMMON_INCLUDES}
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/MetaData
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/DBAtts/SIL
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Database
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Formats
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Database/Ghost
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/FileWriter
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Filters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Base
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Tet
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/MIR/Zoo
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Math
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/AbstractFilters
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Data
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Pipeline
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sinks
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/Pipeline/Sources
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/avt/VisWindow/VisWindow
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/full
${VISIT_INCLUDE_DIR}/visit_vtk/lightweight
${VTK_INCLUDE_DIRS} 
${HDF5_INCLUDE_DIR} 
)

IF(WIN32)
  ADD_DEFINITIONS(-D_HDF5USEDLL_)
ENDIF(WIN32)

SET(LIBRARY_OUTPUT_PATH ${VISIT_PLUGIN_DIR}/databases)

LINK_DIRECTORIES(${VISIT_LIBRARY_DIR} ${VTK_LIBRARY_DIRS} ${HDF5_LIBRARY_DIR} )

ADD_LIBRARY(IM3DDatabase ${LIBI_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(IM3DDatabase visitcommon)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS IM3DDatabase)

IF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)
    ADD_LIBRARY(MM3DDatabase ${LIBM_SOURCES}    )
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(MM3DDatabase visitcommon avtdbatts avtdatabase_ser ${HDF5_LIB} ${ZLIB_LIB} )
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(MM3DDatabase
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DMDSERVER"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} MM3DDatabase)
ENDIF(NOT VISIT_ENGINE_ONLY AND NOT VISIT_DBIO_ONLY)

ADD_LIBRARY(EM3DDatabase_ser ${LIBE_SOURCES})
TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EM3DDatabase_ser visitcommon avtdatabase_ser avtpipeline_ser ${HDF5_LIB} ${ZLIB_LIB} )
SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EM3DDatabase_ser
    PROPERTIES
    COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
)
SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EM3DDatabase_ser)

IF(VISIT_PARALLEL)
    ADD_PARALLEL_LIBRARY(EM3DDatabase_par ${LIBE_SOURCES})
    TARGET_LINK_LIBRARIES(EM3DDatabase_par visitcommon avtdatabase_par avtpipeline_par ${HDF5_LIB} ${ZLIB_LIB} )
    SET_TARGET_PROPERTIES(EM3DDatabase_par
        PROPERTIES
        COMPILE_FLAGS "-DENGINE"
    )
    SET(INSTALLTARGETS ${INSTALLTARGETS} EM3DDatabase_par)
ENDIF(VISIT_PARALLEL)

VISIT_INSTALL_DATABASE_PLUGINS(${INSTALLTARGETS})
